questionTitle: He's very short: ________ sisters are taller.
When ________ dinner.
Kate is the best ________ the three.
Are you ready?  ________.
Leave your dirty shoes ________ the door.
He ________ swim very well.
Peter works in London. ________.
Yeuk Yee had her house painted white yesterday. = ________
anwers: She had to paint her house white yesterday.
Her house was not blue last week.
They painted her house white for her yesterday.

questionTitle: The hotel is ________.
